It's going alright. Not as bad as one would think tbh. Honestly, the first 3 days are pretty bad and then once you slip into ketosis all hunger just sorta stops...
The only reason I had trouble yesterday around the 6.5 day mark was because I went out and did some exercise and that was a bad bad idea.

**Day 7+ of my fast!!**
Yesterday was a living hell. I couldn't even go to sleep. I've been awake for 24+ hours and am barely getting through my uni work.
Am I going to stop anytime soon? Nope. lol
